Show Us Your Gardens

Join Our Event?

Join us at our next event on Saturday 10 June, where you can give your old clothes or a new piece of clothing a new lease of life. You can have holes repaired or give your clothes a new look by having flowers embroidered on them. The only limit is your imagination.

We look forward to seeing you on Saturday 10 June from 12-16 in the shop. We will provide a glass of wine and a unique piece of clothing.

Did You Know?

Did you know that you can plant our labels when you bring home a unique piece of Ruda Patrice clothing?

You can get everything from mint, basil to parsley, what did you bring home?

Simply tear up the label and plant it, you'll also see it grow just like in the video next to it.

We can't wait to watch your plant grow #rudapatriceshowyourgarden.
